Mysteries.Title: The First Joyful Mystery – Mary is Chosen Mother of GOD.
Mysteries.SubTitle: Obedience

Meditation.text: Through the disobedience of Adam sin enters the world.
The Father sends His Son to save the world.
The Angel Gabriel is sent to a virgin named Mary.

The Angel tells Mary:
“You are to have a Son and will name Him Jesus.”
He is the Son of God.
Mary consents: “Let it be done to me.”
God the Son becomes Man, in obedience to His Father.
By His obedience many shall be saved.
Mary becomes Mother of God.
Nothing is impossible with God.

Mysteries.Title: The Second Joyful Mystery – Mary Visits Elizabeth.
Mysteries.SubTitle: Love Others

Meditation.text: Mary visits her elderly cousin Elizabeth.
Elizabeth is with child. His name is John.

She greets Mary:
“Blessed are you because you believed.”
Mary herself is with Child, through the Holy Spirit.

She answers:
“My soul proclaims the greatness of the Lord.”
“His mercy reaches from age to age.”
Mary, the Mother of God, stays to help Elizabeth.
After three months Mary returns to her home in Nazareth.
Do good to all.
Be at peace with everyone.

Mysteries.Title: The Third Joyful Mystery – JESUS is Born
Mysteries.SubTitle: Poverty

Meditation.text: In Bethlehem will be born He Who is to rule my people.
Joseph and Mary leave Nazareth to register in Bethlehem.
There, Mary gives birth to the Son of God.

Mary lays Him in a manger,
because there is no room for Him in the inn.

Angels announce to shepherds nearby:
“The Savior is born.”
Angels sing: “Peace to men of good will.”
Wise men come from the East in search of Christ.
Entering the house in Bethlehem, they worship Him.
All nations serve Him.
Those who accept Christ become children of God.

Mysteries.Title: The Fourth Joyful Mystery – JESUS is Offered to GOD.
Mysteries.SubTitle: Humility

Meditation.text: When the Child Jesus is eight days old, He is circumcised.
And his parents name Him Jesus.
The name of Jesus is the only name by which we can be saved.
“Ask the Father anything in My Name. He will give it to you.”
Lord, You are good and forgiving to all who call upon Your Name.
Joseph and Mary take Jesus to Jerusalem to present Him to God.

Simeon, a holy man, foretells:
“This Child is destined for the fall and rise of many.”
“Your own soul a sword shall pierce.”
Joseph and Mary take Jesus to their hometown of Nazareth.
Whatever you do, do all in the Name of Jesus.

Mysteries.Title: The Fifth Joyful Mystery – JESUS is Found in the Temple.
Mysteries.SubTitle: Joy in Finding Jesus

Meditation.text:
Jesus is twelve years old,
and goes to Jerusalem with Mary and Joseph.
Jesus remains in Jerusalem. His parents do not realize it.
Mary and Joseph return looking for Him.
They find Jesus in the temple.
Jesus was fulfilling the will of His Father.
The Holy Family returns to Nazareth.
Jesus, the Son of God, obeys His parents.
God tells us: Honor your father and your mother.
If you love Me, obey My commandments.
Let us love in thought, in word, and in action. 1
